title: Definitions
context: [ยง572D-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Premarital agreement&rdquo; means an agreement between prospective spouses made in contemplation of marriage and to be effective upon marriage. &ldquo;Property&rdquo; means an interest, present or future, legal or equitable, vested or contingent, in real or personal property, including income and earnings. [L 1987, c 321, pt of ยง1]
